title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - NeoFly - Fly a cargo mission
description:
Always dreamed about a career as cargo pilot? In that case you should definitely looks at NeoFly which adds a career mode to MSFS 2020.
NeoFly is regularly updated with new missions in a wide variety of categories.  
In this video we will look at how to select a cargo mission and fly a short cargo mission and deliver the goods to the destination airport.

The content used in this video can be found on the following site:

https://www.neofly.net/
